content: meet henry the mallard duck now for some reason this little guy is very popular he is responsible for my most popular reel and my most popular post on instagram without even trying originally i designed this one for a dear friend willing to support me through some hard times so believe me when i say he is full of love <3 with a 4mm hook henry is about 6 5cm wide and 6 5cm tall you can sell products made from this pattern but please do credit me in the product description my instagram handle is @edgar_the_octopus i d love to see your makes please do not steal sell or claim this pattern as your own feel free to message me on instagram if you have any questions
